roleset.name: to take possession of
roleset.note: APPROPRIATE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls obtain-13.5.2. (from appropriate.01-v)

APPROPRIATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01, nouns parts 1& 2. Corresponds to verb entry appropriate.01, which is member of Vncls obtain-13.5.2. No FrameNet entry (from appropriation.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The appeals court held : `` When a distinctive voice of a professional singer is widely known [*-3] and is deliberately imitated in order [*]to sell a product [*T*-2] , the sellers have appropriated what [*T*-1] is not theirs . ''

example.name: transitive with adverbials
example.text: And while [*] setting a statutory limit of $ 1.6 billion [*U*]on the automated space probe , the conference appropriated $ 30 million [*U*] for the start-up of the CRAF-Cassini mission , a successor to the Voyager space probe .
example.arg: while [*] setting a statutory limit of $ 1.6 billion [*U*]on the automated space probe
for the start-up of the CRAF-Cassini mission , a successor to the Voyager space probe

example.name: Gol only
example.text: We ould even fly in vetted Indian miners -LRB- with training -RRB- to avoid the secret getting out here . It would benefit us by allowing payments to be made outside our budget appropriations process , which is transparent .

example.name: All args
example.text: ... their appropriation of influences from African-American music?and these genres also strongly influenced many European classical composers...

roleset.name: suitable
roleset.note: APPROPRIATE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from appropriate.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: As a Landmarks Ordinance supporter , I think it is completely appropriate to revisit the ordinance and ammend it if that is the wish of the Common Council .
example.arg: to revisit the ordinance and ammend it if that is the wish of the common council

example.name: both args
example.text: We rely on developmental criteria from some of the nation's leading authorities to determine what content is appropriate for which ages.
